Photo / Mike Scott

Illustration / Anna Crichton

Police have now found two pistols they believe could have been used in the killing in Lake Taupo. Photo / Supplied

Young boy kicked off Colombia flight for failing to follow safety instructions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/travel-news/10-year-old-boy-kicked-off-latam-flight-for-failing-to-follow-safety-instructions/UHPPOGO2OFHSZDV5X4ZFXTPDSA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/travel-news/10-year-old-boy-kicked-off-latam-flight-for-failing-to-follow-safety-instructions/UHPPOGO2OFHSZDV5X4ZFXTPDSA/ The captain ultimately had to move off the runway and return to the airport. Photos / Brett Phibbs, X @ElInformador_SM
